subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[grind]]; to [[sharpen]]
# to [[rub]]; to [[chafe]]
# to [[wear away]]; to [[obliterate]]
# to [[wear out]]; to [[wear down]]; to [[erode]]
# to [[dawdle]]; to [[waste]] (time)
# to [[pester]]; to [[plague]] (someone)
